Score - Class in de.htw.battleship
An instance of this class represents a score, holds the name of the player and number of shots fired by the player during a game and can be exported as a string.
Score(String, int) - Constructor for class de.htw.battleship.Score
Generate a new Score object given a player name and their score

Ship - Class in de.htw.battleship
An instance of this class holds all information to render and identify a ship on a game board.

"Shoots" the given coordinates and checks whether the shot resulted in a HIT, a MISSED_SHOT or even in a sunk ship.
